title: Ebro In The Morning - Lizzo Joins The Program + The Uvalde Police Failings
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 7/15/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez and the crew are in the studio discussing the failure of the police at the Uvalde Shooting, playing ride or die, and welcoming Lizzo into the studio for the release of her new album "Special" out now! 

All that and more on Ebro In The Morning!

Subscribe to "Summer Jam: Through The Years" - hosted by Laura Stylez!

Amazon:https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/6dfef9f3-4ff5-4d05-a857-6689c99aa999/summer-jam-through-the-years

Spotify:https://open.spotify.com/show/7MP62llakMJSXkJzwFclgq

Apple:https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/summer-jam-through-the-years/id1627066431

LISTEN TO TAP IN WITH TT -https://www.hot97.com/tap-in-with-tt/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
